main event: A star-shaped object, the size of a baseball, was observed maneuvering rapidly, changing direction, and was visible on both radar and by air and ground observers.
interesting points: The object was orange in color and observed at an altitude of 30,000 feet,The object remained stationary on radar before rapidly changing direction horizontally,The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes,Ground observers used binoculars to observe the object,Air and ground observers confirmed seeing the same object.
sighted object: star-shaped object size of a baseball
witness description: air and ground observers, including some using binoculars
